trans-unit.source: Nxpy Nonblocking Subprocess implements a Popen subclass that can perform non-blocking I/O towards the controlled process, making it possible to drive interactive programs.
trans-unit.target: Nxpy Nonblocking Subprocess implements a Popen subclass that can perform non-blocking I/O towards the controlled process, making it possible to drive interactive programs.

trans-unit.source: The library’s documentation is available on ReadTheDocs.
trans-unit.target: The library’s documentation is available on ReadTheDocs.

trans-unit.source: You can install the library with pip:
trans-unit.target: Вы можете установить библиотеку с помощью трубопровода:
